ViewObject.Name: UserHoCustExclRegionLookup
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT AUR.REGION_CODE, NVL(AUR.REGION_DESC,FFVV.DESCRIPTION) AS REGION_LABEL, AUR.REGION_CODE || ' ' || NVL(AUR.REGION_DESC,FFVV.DESCRIPTION) AS REGION_SEARCH FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, APP_USER_REGION AUR, PROMO_CUSTX_HO PCH, APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FFV, APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL FFVV WHERE FFVV.FLEX_VALUE = AC.ATTRIBUTE3 AND FFV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FFVV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID AND FFV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'FCSAR_TERRITORY_REGION' AND AC.ATTRIBUTE3 = AUR.REGION_CODE(+) AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTX_HO_ID = :promoCustxId AND NVL(AUR.USER_NAME,1) = ( SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM APP_USER_REGION AUR1 WHERE AUR1.USER_NAME = :userName) = 0 THEN NVL(AUR.USER_NAME,1) ELSE :userName END FROM DUAL ) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE4 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUA.AREA_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUA.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_AREA AUA WHERE AUA.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE4) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUA.AREA_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUA.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_AREA AUA WHERE AUA.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCH.AREA_CODE IS NULL OR PCH.AREA_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE4 = PCH.AREA_CODE) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE5 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.LOCATION_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_LOC AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE5) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.LOCATION_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_LOC AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCH.LOC_CODE IS NULL OR PCH.LOC_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE5 = PCH.LOC_CODE) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE8 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUCT.CUST_TYPE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUCT.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST_TYPE AUCT WHERE AUCT.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE8) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUCT.CUST_TYPE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUCT.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST_TYPE AUCT WHERE AUCT.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCH.CUSTTYP_CODE IS NULL OR PCH.CUSTTYP_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE8 = PCH.CUSTTYP_CODE) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE1 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUCG.CUST_GROUP,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUCG.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST_GROUP AUCG WHERE AUCG.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE1) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUCG.CUST_GROUP,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUCG.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST_GROUP AUCG WHERE AUCG.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCH.CUSTGRP_CODE IS NULL OR PCH.CUSTGRP_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = PCH.CUSTGRP_CODE) AND AC.CUSTOMER_ID IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUC.CUSTOMER_ID,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUC.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST AUC WHERE AUC.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.CUSTOMER_ID) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUC.CUSTOMER_ID,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUC.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST AUC WHERE AUC.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCH.CUSTOMER_ID IS NULL OR PCH.CUSTOMER_ID = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.CUSTOMER_ID = PCH.CUSTOMER_ID) ORDER BY REGION_LABEL
